UserCode
Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInputListener
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInputListener

Simulation is the top-level class for the Aquarium simulation.

Version:
22-02-2021, 1.1
Author:
Kristopher Randle & Marc Price

Constructor Summary
Simulation()
          Constructor for objects of class Simulation
 
Method Summary
 void createBubbles()
          METHOD: is called on each simulation pass.
 void createFood()
          METHOD: Spawns a new 'FishFood' object at the mouse cursors location when the left mouse button is clicked.
 void displayEntities()
          METHOD: This method will iterate through the '_entities' List and inject all of the objects in the List to the 3D world provided as a parameter.

          Method to handle an input event.

          METHOD: This method will populate the '_entities' list so that they can be added to the '_world' later.

Constructor Detail

Simulation

public Simulation()
Constructor for objects of class Simulation

Method Detail

createBubbles

public void createBubbles()
                   throws WorldDoesNotExistException
METHOD: is called on each simulation pass. JavaFish have a 1 in 2000 chance of spawning a Bubble at their mouth. Piranha have a 1 in 900 chance of spawning a bubble.

Throws:
WorldDoesNotExistException

createFood

public void createFood()
                throws WorldDoesNotExistException
METHOD: Spawns a new 'FishFood' object at the mouse cursors location when the left mouse button is clicked.

Throws:
WorldDoesNotExistException

displayEntities

public void displayEntities()
METHOD: This method will iterate through the '_entities' List and inject all of the objects in the List to the 3D world provided as a parameter. An exception is thrown is a user tries to execute this code before the world environment has been created.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

onInput

public void onInput(int... data)
Method to handle an input event. Interface author: Marc Price. Method from: Chris Blythe, week 17 live coding video on BlackBoard.

Specified by:
onInput in interface IInputListener
Parameters:
data - an array of integers containing the input data.

populate

public void populate()
METHOD: This method will populate the '_entities' list so that they can be added to the '_world' later.

run

public void run()
METHOD: Run the simulation loop. User presses escape to exit.
